Summary Objective: Seeking challenging assignments in VLSI Design Engineering with a view to applying technical skills for the betterment of the organization. 
 
Summary:  
 
Have experience in DFT field, Device Testing and Silicon Bringup. 
- DFT test logic implementation includes 
- Scan Test (Scan Insertion & Stitching and checking DRC rules) 
- IEEE1149.1 JTAG architectural implementation and verification 
- MBIST insertion and verification 
- Scan compression techniques 
- OPCG, OCC (generation, PLL locking and triggering techniques and at-speed testing using clock shaper circuits) 
- Stuck-at & Transition faults ATPG (Verification and generation)  
- STA Concepts and worked with EDA tools like Cadence RTL Compiler & Encounter test tool(Architect,Prime time,Test and diagnosis), Testkompress. 
- Have knowledge on GLS flow and DFT flows. 
 
Have experience in DFD field that includes: 
- Pre-silicon validation of multi-core processors like BDX, HSX and SKYLAKE.  
- Worked at micro-architectural levels and at different environments like super cluster, cluster level test environment, unit level, partition and section levels of multi-core processors 
- Worked on deugging features like NOA and IOT  
- Worked on stream compression and mask/matching logic for data tracing  
DFD Tools: Verdi(NOVAS nwave, Ntrace) , TRIAGE and NB(NETBATCH Flow Manager) 
 
Have a thorough understanding of the System Development Life-cycle using sub-micron technologies like 14nm, 45nm, 65nm, 90nm,130nm and 180nm.
